Text: Oñ abu kʼe̩kuku le̩ muda, ku Po̩l fʼumako̩che̩ do̩ wa kʼi la dugbe̩do̩ ñw ma, i che ma agbo̩ oñ i le dufu kʼi nyi Masidonia.
Oñ abu kʼi fʼane̩ o̩wo̩ o̩mo̩ le, kʼi la nʼo̩la wewe adugbe̩do̩ ñw ma, i lewa ane̩ Grik.
Oñ abu kʼi fʼochu me̩ta je̩, kʼamaJu la jʼalu nyʼu abu kʼi ache kʼi tʼo̩ko̩ nyi Siria, ibe ka ñw u kʼi mudabi le Masidonia.
Oñ Sopater e-Pairus e̩ne̩ Be̩rea, kpʼAristarkus kpai Sekundus abo Te̩se̩lo̩nia kpai Gayo̩s abo De̩rbi kpai Timoti kpai Taikikus kpai Trofimus abo Esia fʼahite̩ owñ che gbogbo wʼEsia.
Tak abo le̩ do̩gba unede wa Troas.
Oñ abu kʼo̩jo̩ uje̩wñ ku ma ma dʼo̩jo̩wu tʼo̩ n lale a tʼo̩ko̩ kwo Filipai; o̩jo̩ me̩lu a je̩ tak a nyane̩ ugbo ma Troas. O̩jo̩ mebie a je̩ o̩mo̩.
Oñ o̩jo̩ ejodudu ef o̩jo̩ mebie, abu kʼawa jeju kʼa bʼakala je̩ Po̩l kʼo̩la rʼuma eju, abu kʼa che kʼa lo o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ; oñ i dʼef o̩la le̩ eka gbogbo wʼalumeji odu.
E̩mu wewe la jʼef unyi ojale ugbo kʼawa jo̩ le̩.
Okolobiaʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Yutikus la gugu alu iwido, olu fʼu mu gbali; oñ abu ku Po̩l ka o̩la rʼuma eju alo waa, olu ki mʼu du i muñwa kwo unyi ojale e̩ke̩ta afiane̩, oñ ma mʼoku-wñ du.
Po̩l muda gwo̩ru wane̩ afʼo̩wo̩ lʼu de̩ mʼe̩do̩, i kakini, Me̩ we ekuku-i ta: todu onugo iñmi-wñ dʼef uwñ.
Oñ abu kʼi mute̩gu kʼi fʼakala bu kʼi la dʼu kad alu kʼi laño̩ chʼoluka nana nana gbogbo ñwʼo̩jo̩, abe̩le̩ i kwʼo̩mo̩ le.
Taku ma mʼudeju imo̩to̩ le̩ du lo, oñ e̩do̩-ma kʼi nyi i de̩ ke̩ n.
Oñ awa mʼo̩gba du, a tʼo̩ko̩ nyi Aso̩s, o̩mo̩ a che kʼa gba Po̩l tʼo̩ko̩; todu abu kʼa ka tane̩ le̩ de̩; owñ che kʼi le e̩re̩.
Ama e̩gba kʼi wa de̩ kpʼawa Aso̩s kʼa mʼowñ du, a lewa Mitilini.
Tak abu kʼa tʼo̩ko̩ kwo̩mo̩ o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ a lewa odenideni Chio̩s, o̩jo̩ñwa e-le̩ ge̩ a lewa mane̩ Samo̩s; tak o̩jo̩ñwa e-le̩ a lewa Mailitus:
todu Po̩l fʼibe-wñ ñwa kʼi tʼo̩ko̩ lale gu E̩fe̩-sus du, kʼi we elugo̩ Esia; todu i anaju, iche̩wñ ki je̩ ache kʼi de̩ Je̩rusale̩m o̩jo̩ e̩kʼooje le̩.
Oñ i fʼone̩ kpe̩ kwo Mailitus nyʼE̩fe̩sus kʼi do̩ abogijo ujeju abudo̩ Ondu le̩ wa.
Oñ e̩gba ku ma lewa ugbo owñ i ka ñw ma kakini,
ef uhio̩la wane̩ chaka achuko̩lo̩ adu ñw Ondu, kpʼomi-aku kpai ajama e-kʼi ke̩re̩bʼomi ef alu kʼamaJu jo̩ nyu mi.
Me̩ chema abu kʼu ma dʼo̩wo̩ mo̩ e̩wñ du ki nʼile kʼu we eduka ñw me̩ n, u la we eko̩ me̩ ejʼo̩ja kpai unyi unyi n.
U gbibenu ibe-erida tʼO̩jo̩ kpʼe̩do̩-ekono Ondu-wa Jisus Kraisti ñw amaJu kpai amaGrik nyo̩nyo.
Fai, me̩ la go, nanyi Je̩rusale̩m abu kʼomi chʼe̩ji te̩ ñw afu, u la ma e̩wñ ki ake̩re̩bʼumi o̩mo̩ n:
chai kakini Afu Kiafo̩ nagbʼibenu ñw mi nyo̩nyo̩ ewo tʼewo du kakini e̩ji e-iku kpʼo̩bata anede mi.

U muda fʼonugo-mi lo ka kʼu chʼe̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ akoko ejʼo̩la-mi n, todu kʼule-mi kʼu nara-i kʼu ra kpoji kpʼuko̩lo̩ e̩wñ eche ñw one̩ kʼu gba kwugbo Ondu Jisus owñ chʼibenu Uche̩nyo̩ ufe̩de̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ egba nyo̩nyo̩.
Fa-i me̩ la go, omi chema ka kʼe̩ne̩ du ef ume̩ kʼu te̩te̩tefu me̩ ale atakoya ojane̩ O̩jo̩ ñʼali eju-mi ge̩ n.
Todu kide̩ nagbo̩la-mi ibenu ugbo me̩ eñini kide̩ kakini, Omi de̩hiolo ugbo e̩bie̩ e̩ne̩ du,
todu u dʼo̩wo̩ mʼuneku O̩jo̩ du kʼu we eduka ñw me̩ n.
Me̩ dibetʼo̩la-me̩ kpʼujo̩ amala chaka e-kʼAfu Kiafo̩ ko me̩ jo̩ ku me̩ chʼamafejute̩ ma ku me̩ dejute̩ ujeju abudo̩ O̩jo̩ e-kʼi nʼe̩bie̩ e-wñ la.
Omi chema ka kʼu mʼubi dagba fai amo̩gu e̩bie̩ne̩ awʼef ume̩, ma ado̩wo̩mʼujo̩ amala-i n.
Ef e-me̩ onugo aboke̩le̩ la akwane̩ ako̩la e̩wñ e̩dalo̩ ku ma fʼamako̩che̩ fa tʼama onugo ubi.
Todule̩ me̩ gwe̩ke̩, me̩ ki dibekado ka kʼo̩do̩ me̩ta, tʼodu tʼo̩ro̩ka u we enʼomi aku-mi ako̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ibe n.
Oñ fa-i nako me̩ jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ kpai o̩la ufe̩de̩nyo̩-wñ e-kʼi neke fʼume̩ ne nyo̩gba, kʼi laño̩ neke kʼe̩wñ-ogu ñw me̩ je̩ ef abo kiafo̩ du.
Tʼajifa, tʼajamalia, tʼe̩wñ ku ma du tʼo̩la u che̩ño̩-wñ ugbo e̩ne̩ du n.
Ame̩ onugo chema ka kʼeku e̩wñ kʼi ku mi kpʼabo ku ma jʼugbo-mi o̩wo̩-mi kide̩ u du chʼo̩wo̩ imo̩to̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ ñw a.
U kʼe̩wñ du ña me̩ ka kʼabe̩le̩ i dukpe̩ kʼa achʼakanya uko̩lo̩ tila kʼa chʼabune̩ abʼe̩gbo, kʼa laño̩ dibekado O̩la kʼOndu Jisus ka, kakini, Owñ onugo kakini, Edu e̩wñ ñw one̩ nʼugbede tʼe̩gba le.
Tak abu kʼi fʼe-kide̩ ka i mʼokuku-wñ ko nyane̩ oñ i bʼo̩chaka-ma chadua.
Aku kʼo̩chaka-ma ro̩ la chenana; taku ma lewa anʼo̩lo̩ Po̩l oñ ma dʼalu kʼo̩ alu nana,
e-kʼi awo̩ ma tule oñ chʼo̩la kʼi ka kakʼama ñʼali eju-wñ ge̩ n. Taku ma chaite̩-wñ wʼugbo o̩ko̩.
